    OUR SERVICE

    Empowering both sides of the tube

    Content Creators

    • Choose what gets recommended
    • Can point to any website
    • Get stats about algorithmic treatement

    • Different recommendation systems
    • Suggestions by their favourite YouTubers

    Strategy

    We believe in word of mouth

    YouChoose is built by a non-profit. We promote an internet made for users, not for corporations!
